Body:
resp = await check_response(cli, '/v1/firefox/54.0/buildhub')
body = await resp.json()
assert body['status'] == Status.EXISTS.value
assert 'Build IDs for this release: 20170608175746, 20170608105825' == body[
    'message']
assert body['link'
    ] == 'https://buildhub.moz.tools/?versions[0]=54.0&products[0]=firefox&channel[0]=release'
